00020 #ifndef NETWORK_TCPSOCKET_H
00021 #define NETWORK_TCPSOCKET_H
00022 
00023 #include <iostream>
00024 
00025 #include <rdkcore/network/netexception.h>
00026 #include <rdkcore/network/inetaddress.h>
00027 
00028 namespace Network {
00029 
00030 class TCPSocket : protected std::streambuf, public std::iostream {
00031 public:
00032     TCPSocket( std::streamsize buffersize = 2048 ) throw();
00033     
00034     TCPSocket( const std::string& address, unsigned short port, std::streamsize buffersize = 2048 )
00035         throw( TCPException, NetException );
00036     
00037     TCPSocket( const InetAddress& address, std::streamsize buffersize = 2048 ) throw( TCPException );
00038         
00039     virtual ~TCPSocket();
00040     
00041     inline int getSocket() { return socket; }
00042 
00043 public:
00044     // Close the socket
00045     void disconnect() throw( TCPException );
00046 
00047     // Connect to an host
00048     void connect( const std::string& address, unsigned short port ) throw( TCPException, NetException );
00049 
00050     // Connect on a specified address
00051     void connect( const InetAddress& address ) throw( TCPException );
00052     
00053     const InetAddress& getAddress() const { return address; }
00054     InetAddress getPeerAddress() const;
00055 
00056 private:
00057     friend class TCPServerSocket;
00058     TCPSocket( int socket, const InetAddress& caller_address, std::streamsize buffersize = 2048 );
00059     void connect() throw( TCPException );
00060     
00061     TCPSocket( const TCPSocket& );
00062     const TCPSocket& operator= ( const TCPSocket& ) { return *this; }
00063 
00064 // Streambuffer implementation
00065 protected:
00066     virtual int overflow( int c = EOF );
00067     virtual int underflow();
00068     virtual int sync();
00069 
00070 private:
00071     int     socket;
00072     InetAddress address;
00073     char*       inbuffer;
00074     char*       outbuffer;
00075     const std::streamsize buffersize;
00076 };
00077 
00078 }
